Articles.Content:
It is time to take the red planet commander!.And here at the Kaether Space Center we have a wide vairity of vehicle blueprints you can take for all your colony construction needs!.

We offer you from the small drones to the big RC rover!.

Catalog:

  Drones:

Spoiler

The drones are the backbone of every colony settled on Duna and beyond.They will go from un-packaging the rocket precius cargo to building the artificial Kerbol!.They are aswell made to survive everything that Duna can throw at them.From those little sand storms to those meteors.Off course if you mainting them right.(The Kaether Space Center does not make refunds if a rover brakes.)
Change log:
V1.0 Inithial release

How to get them to Duna:

There are 2 ways of bringing one of this rovers to Duna.

Way 1 and the hardcore one:Make a big rocket and load a drone in it.You can asswell Spacedrop them with a chute(Parachutes or rockets not included)

Or the Normal way that probably nobody thought of.Dowload a mod that lets you build rockets far from kerbin.Like extraplanetary launchpads.Once everything is ready .Build them!.

How to recharge them:

Now before someone say"Yo @KerbolExplorer ya forgot those solar panels or RTG`s"...Well that is made on pourpose.You see in Surviving mars the drones dont have solar panels.They need to recharge at a drone hub/drone recharger.In KSP you will need KAS.You can connect the drone with cables to the colony.Of course these have to be done by a kerbal.

How to get contact with kerbin:

So if you are playing with Kerbcom on you will need to get a stable signal with kerbin.And you might notice:the rocket drone does not have an antenna.How to solve this?

Download links:

Steamworkshop:https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1441980702

KerbalX:https://kerbalx.com/Kerbolexplorer/Surviving-mars-drone
